channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: 不動産や食品における "特権のジャーナリズム "は、時として、人間の本質的なニーズに関する一般人の体験の報道に取って代わることがある（Alissa Quart/Columbia Journalism Review）
item.description:
Alissa Quart / Columbia Journalism Review:
A look at the “journalism of privilege” in real estate and food, which can at times replace reporting on ordinary people's experiences of essential human needs  —  Celebrity-owned $25,000 glass-door fridges; hotel owners “writing off San Francisco” as the market drops …

item.title: スカイが高等法院の命令を勝ち取り、イギリスのISPはサッカーの試合やテレビ番組、その他のリニアチャンネルコンテンツを違法にストリーミングする海賊版サービスをブロックすることになる（Daniel Thomas/Financial Times）。
item.description:
Daniel Thomas / Financial Times:
Sky wins a High Court order that will force UK ISPs to block piracy services from illegally streaming football games, TV shows, and other linear channel content  —  Directive is designed to protect a broader range of content  —  Sky has won a High Court order that will force internet service providers …

item.title: インドの一部の放送局では、実物そっくりのAIキャスターを使ってニュースや天気予報などを伝えており、雇用喪失の懸念やメディアの信頼性への疑問が高まっている（Neeta Lal/Nikkei Asia）
item.description:
Neeta Lal / Nikkei Asia:
Some Indian broadcasters are using lifelike AI anchors to deliver news, weather reports, and more, raising job loss fears and questions about media credibility  —  Virtual anchors mean no ‘ego hassles’ in newsrooms, but will they kill jobs?  —  A screenshot from Odisha TV's YouTube channel shows Lisa …

item.title: マオヤン：中国の映画館は、愛国的で男性主導のアクション映画が支配的な市場において、『バービー』の上映回数を7月21日の9,673回から7月27日には～36,000回に増やした（フィナンシャル・タイムズ）。
item.description:
Financial Times:
Maoyan: cinemas in China increased showings of Barbie from 9,673 on July 21 to ~36,000 on July 27, in a market dominated by patriotic and male-led action films  —  Cinemas increase showings of Greta Gerwig blockbuster in market dominated by action films and patriotic tales

item.title: Twitter/X、2022年12月に停止されたカニエ・ウェストのアカウントを復活させ、収益化の対象外とし、投稿の横に広告が表示されないようにすると発表（Rebecca Elliott/Wall Street Journal）
item.description:
Rebecca Elliott / Wall Street Journal:
Twitter/X reinstates Kanye West's account, suspended in December 2022, and says he won't be eligible to monetize it, and ads won't appear next to his posts  —  West won't be eligible to monetize his account, and ads won't appear next to his posts  —  X, the social-media platform formerly known …

item.title: メタ社内の電子メール：フェイスブックはバイデン政権からの圧力でCOVID-19に関するコンテンツを削除、その中にはウイルスが人為的なものだと主張する投稿も含まれていた（Ryan Tracy/Wall Street Journal）
item.description:
Ryan Tracy / Wall Street Journal:
Internal Meta emails: Facebook removed content about COVID-19 under pressure from the Biden administration, including posts claiming the virus was man-made  —  Internal Meta emails say pressure from Washington was behind a decision to take down posts attributing pandemic to man-made virus

item.title: 1998年にテックダートを設立したマイク・マスニックのプロフィールは、テック業界で何が起きているかを知る上で欠かせないガイドとして、議員やCEO、活動家たちから注目されている（Kashmir Hill/New York Times）。
item.description:
Kashmir Hill / New York Times:
A profile of Mike Masnick, who founded Techdirt in 1998, considered by lawmakers, CEOs, and activists as an essential guide for what's happening in tech  —  Mike Masnick, who founded Techdirt in 1998, writes for an influential audience of lawmakers, C.E.O.s and activists.

item.title: 米連邦地裁判事、"Big Lie "という言葉を使ったトランプ氏のCNNに対する名誉毀損訴訟を棄却。トランプ氏の弁護士は、この言葉は彼をアドルフ・ヒトラーと結びつけていると述べた（Ted Johnson/Deadline）
item.description:
Ted Johnson / Deadline:
A US district judge dismisses Trump's defamation suit against CNN for using the term “Big Lie”; Trump's lawyers said the phrase linked him with Adolf Hitler  —  A federal judge dismissed Donald Trump's $475 million defamation lawsuit against CNN, litigation centered on references …

item.title: ジャーナリストの家庭に育ち、スタンフォード大学学長辞任に貢献した大学生、テオ・ベイカーのプロフィール（リサ・ボノス／ワシントン・ポスト紙）
item.description:
Lisa Bonos / Washington Post:
Profile of Theo Baker, a college student who grew up in a family of journalists and whose reporting contributed to the resignation of Stanford's president  —  College journalist Theo Baker's reporting paved the way for Marc Tessier-Lavigne's resignation  —  SAN FRANCISCO — On Christmas Day …

item.title: 公正なストリーミング報酬を求める戦いと、主要スタジオとギルドが満足するパフォーマンス指標と収益分配を見出す挑戦（Katie Campione/Deadline）
item.description:
Katie Campione / Deadline:
A look at the fight for fair streaming compensation and the challenge to find performance metrics and a revenue share that satisfy the major studios and guilds  —  Several experts stressed to Deadline that the central argument isn't about whether there is infrastructure to support such a deal.

item.title: 香港の判事が、グーグルや他のサイトでの香港への民主化推進ソング「グローリー」のネット配信禁止を求める政府の訴えを却下（Newley Purnell/Wall Street Journal）
item.description:
Newley Purnell / Wall Street Journal:
A Hong Kong judge rejects a government bid to ban the online dissemination of pro-democracy song Glory to Hong Kong on Google and other sites  —  Judge refuses to issue order blocking online dissemination of protest anthem, saying criminal acts can be punished by the city's current laws

item.title: Twitter/X、今月上旬に一部のクリエイターに支払いを行った広告収益分配プログラムを、対象ユーザーを対象に全世界で正式に展開（Jay Peters/The Verge）
item.description:
Jay Peters / The Verge:
Twitter/X officially rolls out its ads revenue sharing program for eligible users globally, after giving some creators payouts earlier this month  —  Twitter, which Elon Musk is currently rebranding to X, is officially rolling out its ads revenue sharing program for creators.

item.title: YouTube、YouTube TVとPrimetime ChannelsのMultiviewを正式に開始、まずはWNBAの試合から、ただしモバイルとウェブは非対応、その他制限あり（Abner Li/9to5Google）
item.description:
Abner Li / 9to5Google:
YouTube officially launches Multiview for YouTube TV and Primetime Channels, starting with WNBA games, but with no mobile and web support and other limits  —  After testing for the past several months, YouTube is officially launching Multiview for YouTube TV and Primetime Channels, starting with WNBA games.

item.title: フロリダ州判事が、ディズニーのオーランド・テーマパークの将来的な開発に対する州の管理を主張する州訴訟の却下を求めるディズニーの申し立てを却下した（Gene Maddaus/Variety）
item.description:
Gene Maddaus / Variety:
A Florida judge rejects Disney's motion to throw out a state lawsuit that seeks to assert state control over future development of Disney's Orlando theme parks  —  Disney lost a bid on Friday to throw out a state court lawsuit that seeks to assert state control over future development of its Orlando theme parks.

item.title: ハリウッドのストライキが続く中、ソニーが『スパイダーマン：ビヨンド・ザ・スパイダーバース』の公開を無期限延期し、『クレイブン』などの公開日をシャッフル（Matt Donnelly/Variety）
item.description:
Matt Donnelly / Variety:
Sony indefinitely delays the release of Spider-Man: Beyond the Spider-Verse and shuffles dates for Kraven and other movies as Hollywood strikes continue  —  Sony Pictures has made some significant release date shifts for its upcoming films, including “Kraven the Hunter” and “Spider-Man: Beyond the Spider-Verse.”
